title: address issue #1488 by using defaultdict in packed_state
body_html: The bug is related to the function "state_dict()" of class "optimizer.py". When the state is transformed to packed_state, it uses dict instead of defaultdict, which is inconsistent with the type of state. So I change the packed_state to be defaultdict to maintain consistency with self.state.
body_text: The bug is related to the function "state_dict()" of class "optimizer.py". body: The bug is related to the function "state_dict()" of class "optimizer.py". When the state is transformed to packed_state, it uses dict instead of defaultdict, which is inconsistent with the type of state. So I change the packed_state to be defaultdict to maintain consistency with self.state.
